definition: not accepting reservations, the act of moving hurriedly and in a careless manner, urge to an unnatural speed
details:
adjective
- not accepting reservations
= synonyms: first-come-first-serve
- done under pressure
= synonyms: rushed
noun
- the act of moving hurriedly and in a careless manner
= synonyms: haste
- in American football, an attempt to advance the ball by running into the line
= example: in American football, an attempt to advance the ball by running into the line
= synonyms: rushing
- a sudden burst of activity
= example: a sudden burst of activity
- a sudden forceful flow
= synonyms: surge
- the swift release of a store of affective force
= synonyms: kick
- grasslike plants growing in wet places and having cylindrical often hollow stems
verb
- urge to an unnatural speed
= example: urge to an unnatural speed
= synonyms: hurry
- act or move at high speed
= example: act or move at high speed
= synonyms: hurry
- attack suddenly
- cause to occur rapidly
= synonyms: stimulate, hasten, induce
- to move fast
= example: to move fast
= synonyms: speed
- cause to move fast or to rush or race
= synonyms: race
- run with the ball, in football
